attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned believe that we have the right as human beings to choose whether we want to play a video game and what we think about a video game.
The fact that some people may kill someone copying what they have seen in a videogame says more about them as a person than the game itself. Games do not create murderers, mentally ill people with a tendency to kill create murderers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
